title: YIVIEW Sleep Mask for Men Women, 100% Light Blocking 3D Eye Mask of Night Sleeping Blindfold, Relaxing Zero Pressure Eye Cover, memory foam, skin-friendly, lightweight, adjustable buckle strap for different head sizes and shapes
descriptions:
YIVIEW Sleep Mask for Men and Women

Sleep better, anytime and anywhere. This gentle mask keeps all light out so you can rest.

What makes it easy and comfortable:
- Blocks 100% of light. Good for daytime naps, bright rooms, or travel.
- Soft 3D shape with deep eye pockets. Your eyes can blink freely. No pressure on your eyelids or eyelashes.
- Zero pressure on the eyes. No sore spots. No marks on your face or forehead.
- Soft memory foam. Lightweight, smooth, and kind to sensitive skin.
- Clean fabric. Lint-free, fade-resistant, and won’t stain your pillowcases.
- Better nose cutout. Stops light from sneaking in at the bottom.
- Strong seams, no glue. Built to last and not fall apart.

Easy to put on:
- Adjustable buckle strap. Fits many head sizes and shapes.
- Tangle-free design. Won’t catch in your hair.

Good for:
- Nighttime sleep at home.
- Naps in a chair or recliner.
- Travel on airplanes, trains, or cars.
- Camping or bright hospital rooms.

Simple care tips:
- Hand wash gently. Air dry.
- Store flat to keep its shape.

If you want a soft, gentle, and truly dark sleep, the YIVIEW Sleep Mask makes resting simple and comfortable.
